recipe.title: Brown Sugar Blondies
recipe.ingredients: 120g (1 cup) flour all purpose flour ¾ teaspoon baking powder ½ teaspoon cinnamon ¼ teaspoon salt ¼ teaspoon baking soda 85g (6 tbsp) vegan butter 150g (¾ cup) light brown sugar 3 tbsp dairy-free milk 2 tbsp peanut butter 1 tbsp vanilla extract 1 tbsp other extract e.g. almond 60g (⅓ cup) dark chocolate chips 60g (⅓ cup) chopped hazelnuts

method.step: Preheat oven to 180°C. Line an 8-inch pan with baking paper, long enough so edges overhang.
In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking powder, cinnamon, salt and baking soda until combined.
Using a stand mixer (or hand-held), beat the butter, brown sugar, milk, peanut butter, and extracts until combined. Slowly beat in the flour mixture.
Once the flour is incorporated, stir in chocolate chips and chopped nuts. Batter will be thick.
Evenly pat the batter into the prepared pan. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.
Let the blondies cool in the baking tray. Cut into 16 squares and serve.
